description: 它是一个高大、优雅、纤细的人形外星人，散发着明亮的紫色水晶光，它的头看起来像一个水样的水滴，上面长着像头发一样的长触须，除了充满恶意的细长眼睛外，几乎看不出它的面部特征

special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: The %s attempts to pierce <npcname> with it's glowing halberd, but they dodge!

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_light_red>%1$s找到%3$s的弱点，全力撕碎！</color>

description: 一个高大的皮革皮肤凶猛的人形外星人发射出明亮的太阳橙色水晶光，它的前额是脊状的，它的整个脸上覆盖着多个弯曲的尖刺，它的脖子上有一些呼吸管，它穿着一套轻型装甲服，挥舞着一把外形圆滑的未来派小型机关枪

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_light_red>%1$s瞄准精确，在%3$s发射了一颗沉重的太阳橙色等离子体！</color>

description: 在这片明亮的橙色光柱的中心，散发着令人毛骨悚然的太阳光

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: The %1$s ferociously swings it's long tentacles at you!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: The %1$s ferociously swings it's long tentacles at <npcname>!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: The %1$s tries to ferociously swing it's long tentacles at you, but fails to penetrate your armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: The %1$s tries to ferociously swing it's long tentacles at <npcname>, but fails to penetrate their armor!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: The %s ferociously swings it's long tentacles at you, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: The %s ferociously swings it's long tentacles at <npcname>, but they dodge!

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_light_red>%1$s召唤出一个明亮的巨大的太阳橙色球体，在%3$s处剧烈爆炸！</color>
<color_light_red>%1$s召唤出%3$s处奇异激光的明亮太阳橙色光线！</color>
